name: Custom Mate 2 & Itsuka Dokoka de.
overview: Custom Mate 2 & Itsuka Dokoka de compiles two adult hentai games formerly released on the PC-98: Custom Mate 2 and Itsuka Dokoka de. Both games play similarly to their original versions and can be chosen from a menu appearing when the game boots; however it is only possible to play one of the games at a time.
